channel.title: How to make pvp weapons not use 45 defence delta 317
channel.description: i need help with the title

item.title: How to make pvp weapons not use 45 defence delta 317
item.dc:creator: @Eclipse639 Eclipse639
item.description:
@Eclipse639 wrote:

Can’t remember if it’s Wearing.java or Equipment.java on a 317, it’s been ages.

But check for either of those classes, if you find it open it up. Search the beginning of the name of the PvP weapon name for Example “Statius”

You will see something saying “return 45;” right under it, just change that number or delete the whole if (itemNameContains) Statement.

Sorry I can’t be more help, It’s been like 3 years since I’ve touched a 317.
Can’t remember the setup for it :3

Read full topic
item.source: How to make pvp weapons not use 45 defence delta 317
